content:
Tati Westbrook is a great inspiration! She's a renowned beauty YouTuber known for her honest reviews and tutorials. As a beginner, it's excellent that you're looking to invest in good-quality products that will help you build a solid makeup routine. Here are some popular, beginner-friendly products across various categories that are highly rated by Tati and the beauty community:

**Foundation:**

1. Urban Decay Naked Skin Foundation ( approx. $30) - A lightweight, buildable foundation with a natural finish.
2. Maybelline Fit Me! Dewy + Smooth Tint (approx. $11) - An affordable, hydrating foundation with a natural finish.

**Concealer:**

1. Tarte Shape Tape Concealer (approx. $27) - A full-coverage concealer that's great for hiding blemishes and dark circles.
2. NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer (approx. $26) - A creamy, buildable concealer that provides medium to high coverage.

**Powder:**

1. Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder (approx. $25) - A lightweight, translucent powder that sets your makeup without adding color.
2. Rimmel Stay Matte Pressed Powder (approx. $6) - An affordable, oil-controlling powder that helps keep your makeup in place.

**Eyeshadow:**

1. Urban Decay Naked Palette (approx. $59) - A classic, neutral eyeshadow palette with 12 shades.
2. ColourPop Yes, Please! Palette (approx. $16) - An affordable, 12-pan eyeshadow palette with a mix of neutrals and pops of color.

**Mascara:**

1. Benefit They're Real! Mascara (approx. $23) - A lengthening and volumizing mascara that gives you full, separated lashes.
2. L'Oréal Paris Voluminous Lash Paradise Mascara (approx. $11) - A budget-friendly, volumizing mascara that gives you full, luscious lashes.

**Blush:**

1. NARS Blush in Orgasm (approx. $26) - A peachy-pink blush that gives you a natural, healthy glow.
2. Milk Makeup Creamy Face Blush in Rosey (approx. $16) - A creamy, buildable blush that adds a touch of color to your cheeks.

**Highlighter:**

1. Becca Shimmering Skin Perfector in Moonstone (approx. $38) - A liquid highlighter that gives you a natural, radiant glow.
2. Wet n Wild MegaGlo Highlighting Powder in Hollywood Boulevard (approx. $5) - An affordable, pressed highlighter that adds a subtle glow to your skin.

**Brushes:**

1. Real Techniques Core Collection Brush Set (approx. $18) - A starter brush set that includes 4 essential brushes for foundation, concealer, powder, and blush.
2. Morphe M530 Brush (approx. $10) - A versatile, synthetic brush that's great for applying foundation, concealer, and powder.

Remember, these are just a few examples of popular products that are great for beginners. It's essential to choose products that suit your skin type, tone, and personal preferences. Don't be afraid to read reviews, watch tutorials, and swatch products before making a purchase. Happy shopping!
